name: Adaptyv
headline: We're building fully automated labs for protein engineering
description: Proteins are the most advanced nanotechnology we know of. At Adaptyv, we‚Äôre building a fully automated protein foundry to allow you to synthesize and test any protein you design.

founders.name: Julian Englert, Founder
founders.description:
MSc in Materials Science / Biomedical Technologies
Worked for health-tech startup Xsensio in Lausanne, Switzerland for a year
Quit, travelled for a few months and then started working on Adaptyv

founders.name: Daniel Nakhaee-Zadeh Gutierrez, Founder
founders.description: I am passionate about engineering biology to positively impact society and the environment. I have been lucky enough to develop my experience over the years in the fields of immunoengineering, synthetic biology and computational biology in some of the best universities in the world (Harvard, University of Leeds, KAIST, EPFL). Now in charge of Operations at Adaptyv.

raw_markdown="![Adaptyv Biosystems logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62fb93419facc84cdbf56314/632c4f80fbc19313005e3047_Adaptyv%20Bio%20Logo.svg)
[Technology](https://www.adaptyvbio.com/</>)[Blog](https://www.adaptyvbio.com/</blog>)[Team](https://www.adaptyvbio.com/</team>)[Careers](https://www.adaptyvbio.com/</careers>)[API](https://www.adaptyvbio.com/<https:/beta.adaptyvbio.com/api>)[TEST YOUR PROTEINS](https://www.adaptyvbio.com/<https:/beta.adaptyvbio.com/>)
[**Live:** Protein Design Competition](https://www.adaptyvbio.com/<https:/foundry.adaptyvbio.com/competition>)
# The Cloud Lab for Protein Designers
Generate high-quality experimental data for any protein you design
[GET STARTED](https://www.adaptyvbio.com/<https:/beta.adaptyvbio.com/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62fb93419facc84cdbf56314/633c419489f31c3d5919f79c_Isolted%20protein%202.0.jpg)
## Imagine If We Could...
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62fb93419facc84cdbf56314/635a565671ea33e9e6b31a21_Medicine-gradient-icon.svg)
design smart medicines that repair any damage occurring in our bodies before it turns into a disease
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62fb93419facc84cdbf56314/635a56561f520ca63851d969_Energy-gradient-icon.svg)
create new molecular machines to fulfil complex functions like catalysis, energy generation or computation
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62fb93419facc84cdbf56314/635a5657e14b8d05659366c9_Recycle-gradient-icon.svg)
produce valuable new materials from basic organic inputs, without toxic byproducts and recycle them easily
## Proteins Are Nature's Nanomachines
### Let's Unlock The Power Of AI To Design New Ones
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62fb93419facc84cdbf56314/642469ecc8e23dd3912513db_Protein%20universe%20sphere%20-%20full%202.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62fb93419facc84cdbf56314/6425460b432e051735ad9f46_Protein%20universe%20sphere%20-%20croped%20for%20mobile.jpg)
The space of possible protein designs is incredibly large and complex. Both natural evolution and humans to date have explored but a tiny sliver of it. Using AI we can finally venture out and design new proteins that will be at the core of revolutionizing technologies across medicine, manufacturing, computation and power generation.
## Closing The Loop
With generative AI you can create novel protein designs for your application, whether that's an antibody, an enzyme or something completely new.
#### Design
#### Build
Using the power of cell-free synthetic biology we streamline protein expression, enabling the synthesis of thousands of designed proteins on demand.
This data provides feedback and augments the AI models at each round in order to optimize the functional profile of the next set of protein designs.
#### Learn
#### Test
Our automated workcells can profile the protein designs for any range of functions and interactions to generate high-quality experimental data
## The AI-First Lab For Protein Design
Our lab is being built from the ground up to integrate with AI at every step of the protein engineering cycle - from designing sequences, to planning experimental protocols, to running those experiments autonomously and tracking all data and metadata. This is how biology should be done and we're making it happen.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62fb93419facc84cdbf56314/633ef1b378c6fa42789bfa6f_Microfluidic%20chip%20bgd%202.1.jpg)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62fb93419facc84cdbf56314/64234af6f433d41d057d0451_Adaptyv%20Bio%20logo%20blue%20on%20black%201%20line.svg)](https://www.adaptyvbio.com/</>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Adaptyv**

Adaptyv is revolutionizing the field of protein engineering by creating fully automated labs dedicated to designing and synthesizing proteins. Founded as part of Y Combinator‚Äôs S21 batch, and situated in the picturesque city of Lausanne, Switzerland, Adaptyv operates with a nimble team of 12 employees. The company operates under the belief that proteins are the most advanced nanotechnology known to humanity, and they are proving this concept by building a protein foundry where anyone can test their designs.

**Mission and Vision**

Adaptyv‚Äôs mission is straightforward yet profound: to allow researchers to synthesize and analyze any protein they can imagine. They leverage AI to enrich the process, helping to design proteins that could bring solutions to myriad modern challenges in medicine, materials, and biotechnology.

Picture this: what if we could design smart medicines that preemptively repair damage before it manifests as a disease? Or create molecular machines capable of revolutionary tasks like catalysis and energy generation? Adaptyv is not just dreaming about this future; they are building the tools to make it a reality.

**Technology and Process**

At the core of Adaptyv's innovation is an AI-first lab that integrates cutting-edge technology at every stage of protein engineering. Their process involves:

1. **Design**: Utilizing generative AI to create novel protein designs tailored for specific applications.
2. **Build**: Employing cell-free synthetic biology to facilitate the rapid synthesis of hundreds of designed proteins simultaneously.
3. **Learn**: Gathering and refining data to inform future designs continuously.
4. **Test**: Using automated workcells to evaluate the functions and interactions of these proteins, leading to high-quality experimental data.

This closed-loop system ensures that every round of experimentation not only tests proteins but also enhances the AI models guiding future designs, creating a feedback loop that accelerates knowledge and innovation.

**Key Areas of Focus**

Adaptyv is categorized under 'AI-powered drug discovery' and 'synthetic biology', emphasizing its dual commitment to enhancing therapeutic development through advanced automation and artificial intelligence. Their ongoing initiatives include hosting protein design competitions and developing an accessible API for researchers.

**Looking Ahead**

As we stand at the brink of a new era in biotechnology, companies like Adaptyv are primed to lead the charge. By integrating AI with the complexities of protein synthesis, they are opening doors to unprecedented biotechnological advancements. Whether it's in health, energy, or sustainable materials, Adaptyv is poised to make a substantial impact.

For more information or to get involved, check out their website at [Adaptyv Bio](https://www.adaptyvbio.com/).
